snippet: KETTANEH--Mary. I lost a great friend and supporter. NYC has lost a gracious and generous benefactor. Mary was from the old school and lived her life as Downton Abbey. O. Aldon James Jr. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KETTANEH--Mary. I lost a great friend and supporter. NYC has lost a gracious and generous benefactor. Mary was from the old school and lived her life as Downton Abbey. O. Aldon James Jr. 1/3
